name: Devil's Portrait
desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck or Extra Deck with the same name, but shuffle it into the Deck during the End Phase of the next turn, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Deck or Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "Devil's Portrait" once per turn.
